availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Nathan H. Jeffers (Grant County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk. Married to Susan V. Dills Jeffers on August 13, 1862. Clerk for the Grant Circuit Court in Grant County from 1860-1865.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Grant, Williamstown, p. 185; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records Ã± Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #001490815, Grant County Marriages, p. 148.
